service.title: HTTP-client suggested Push Preference
service.documentation: "Prefer-Push" is a HTTP header that a client may use to request that a server uses HTTP/2 Push to send related resources as identified by their link relationships.

http-header.documentation: "Prefer-Push" is an HTTP header field that a client may use to request that a server uses HTTP/2 Push to send related resources as identified by their link relationships.
